TZ.description: Put TIME_ZONE according to your location

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: Put Your Heroku Api Key Here

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Put Your Heroku App Name Here

WAPRESENCE.description: Fill the value: 'unavailable'(for nothing) | 'available'(for alwaysonline) | 'composing'(for typing) | 'recording' | 'paused'

AUTO_READ_STATUS.description: Fill the value true if you want bot view your Statuses.

GURL.description: Fill the value true if you want to see Messages in Console.

READ_MESSAGE.description: Fill the value true if you want bot to read all messages.

OWNER_NUMBER.description: Disable bot in pm, Take it false if you wanna run bot in your pm (if MODE is Public)

PREFIX.description: Enter your desired prefix for bot.

OPENAI_API_KEY.description: put your OPENAI api key here.Get it from beta.openai.com

ELEVENLAB_API_KEY.description: Put your ElevenLab api key here for Aitts. Watch tutorial from https://youtu.be/HCDcdPtkwg4

READ_COMMAND.description: put your REMOVE BG KEY here.Get it from removeBg.com

MODE.description: Worktype of your bot. Use public or private, if it is private then only bot number can use it. If public then everyone can use it.

WELCOME.description: Put Your Heroku App Name Here

GOODBYE.description: Put Your Heroku App Name Here
